html: Are you without power? Remember: - Never use a gas-powered generator or other fuel-burning appliances indoors or in garage - Never use charcoal grills or propane stoves indoors, even in a fireplace - Never use a gas oven to heat home, even for short amount of time @NCEmergency
text:
Are you without power? Remember: 
- Never use a gas-powered generator or other fuel-burning appliances indoors or in garage
- Never use charcoal grills or propane stoves indoors, even in a fireplace
- Never use a gas oven to heat home, even for short amount of time
@NCEmergency

html: .@FtBraggNC is operating on a normal schedule tomorrow for the 1st time since #FlorenceNC hit. BUT If you are not able to make it into work, troops should contact their chain of command. Bragg doesn't want you coming to work if its not safe. But you've got to talk to someone.
text:
.@FtBraggNC is operating on a normal schedule tomorrow for the 1st time since #FlorenceNC hit.

BUT

If you are not able to make it into work, troops should contact their chain of command.

Bragg doesn't want you coming to work if its not safe. But you've got to talk to someone.

text:
#HurricaneFlorerence @DukeEnergy customers who experience an outage can report it by:

•Visiting http://duke-energy.com  on a computer or mobile device
•Texting OUT to 57801 (standard text & data charges may apply)
•Calling the automated outage-reporting system at 800-769-3766

html: Just interviewed a former state trooper who lived through Katrina and Rita. His advice, if you get a generator, lock it up outside w/ a chain. Do not bring it or use it inside. He knows the risk of fatal CO poisoning is real. #WCNCFlorence #protip #hurricaneflorence #PrepareNow
text: Just interviewed a former state trooper who lived through Katrina and Rita. His advice, if you get a generator, lock it up outside w/ a chain. Do not bring it or use it inside. He knows the risk of fatal CO poisoning is real. #WCNCFlorence #protip #hurricaneflorence #PrepareNow

html: Important numbers for during & after #HurricaneFlorence Dial 9-1-1 if you are in danger & in need of immediate assistance. Dial 2-1-1 to reach a live call specialist who has information about community resources, shelters, food, water and other storm recovery resources.
text:
Important numbers for during & after #HurricaneFlorence  

Dial 9-1-1 if you are in danger & in need of immediate assistance. 

Dial 2-1-1 to reach a live call specialist who has information about community resources, shelters, food, water and other storm recovery resources.

html: For all of you in the path of #HurricaneFlorence , take this storm seriously and get prepared now. Matthew thought us some lessons 2 years ago. We are leaning forward by preparing Army forces now to be ready to respond quickly in support of @NCTAG and @USArmyNorth .
text:
For all of you in the path of #HurricaneFlorence , take this storm seriously and get prepared now.  Matthew thought us some lessons 2 years ago. 

We are leaning forward by preparing Army forces now to be ready to respond quickly in support of @NCTAG and @USArmyNorth .

html: Despite the uncertainty of #HurricaneFlorence's exact path, our community should be prepared and brace for major impacts like flash flooding, storm surge and strong winds. Stay informed. Listen to local officials. Update your emergency kit. Prepare NOW. http://www.ready.gov/hurricanes

html: Expect that services will be disrupted for an extended amount of time. Be ready for: Power/phone service outages Roads blocked by floodwater and/or debris Water/sewer outages. Follow @Readygov for more tips & talk about your emergency plan with family members. #Florence
text:
Expect that services will be disrupted for an extended amount of time. Be ready for:
Power/phone service outages
Roads blocked by floodwater and/or debris
Water/sewer outages.
Follow @Readygov for more tips & talk about your emergency plan with family members. #Florence

html: The safety of our constituents is our top priority. I'm encouraging my constituents to review hurricane preparedness plans, make sure emergency kits are stocked and prepare for a direct & major impact. My wife Renee & I are praying for the safety of everyone in Florence's path.

As forecasts show #HurricaneFlorence is gaining strength and will likely make landfall in the Carolinas, we have decided to cancel this year's business summit.

html: Today is national #PurpleHeart day, a day to pay tribute to the men and women who have received the Purple Heart for being wounded or killed in action. html: Today @BlueCrossNC requested an avg rate decrease of 4.1% for 2019 ACA plans - the first rate decrease since the ACA became law. In 2015, rates increased by 13.5%; in 2016, 32.5%; in 2017, 24.3%. After years of double-digit rate hikes, this is good news, but we can do better.
text: Today @BlueCrossNC requested an avg rate decrease of 4.1% for 2019 ACA plans - the first rate decrease since the ACA became law. In 2015, rates increased by 13.5%; in 2016, 32.5%; in 2017, 24.3%. After years of double-digit rate hikes, this is good news, but we can do better.
